alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Caribou Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 4:05AM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected with a mix of rain and snow in the valleys. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches in the mountains above 6500 feet MSL and 5 to 10 inches in the valleys below 6500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Emigration Summit, Wayan, Swan Valley, and Victor. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Caribou Range
